Description_lang: Soul Shards torment the afflicted player until they are touched, inflicting $s1 Shadow damage every $t1 sec, reduce movement speed by $s2%, and reduce damage and healing done by $s3%. This effect stacks.
AuraDescription_lang: $s1 Shadow damage inflicted every $t1 sec.Movement speed reduced by $s2%.Damage and healing done reduced by $s3% Collect your Soul Shards to end this effect.
